detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address) (shared/denial_of_service/list_dos/list_dos_2round.sol#20-64):
	External calls:
	- corruptElite.transfer(amount * 5 / 100) (shared/denial_of_service/list_dos/list_dos_2round.sol#42)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- profitFromCrash += amount * 5 / 100 (shared/denial_of_service/list_dos/list_dos_2round.sol#45)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Government.lendGovernmentMoney(address) (shared/denial_of_service/list_dos/list_dos_2round.sol#20-64):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(amount) (shared/denial_of_service/list_dos/list_dos_2round.sol#24)
	- corruptElite.transfer(this.balance) (shared/denial_of_service/list_dos/list_dos_2round.sol#25)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- delete creditorAddresses (shared/denial_of_service/list_dos/list_dos_2round.sol#31)
	- delete creditorAmounts (shared/denial_of_service/list_dos/list_dos_2round.sol#32)
	- lastCreditorPayedOut = 0 (shared/denial_of_service/list_dos/list_dos_2round.sol#27)
	- lastTimeOfNewCredit = block.timestamp (shared/denial_of_service/list_dos/list_dos_2round.sol#28)
	- profitFromCrash = 0 (shared/denial_of_service/list_dos/list_dos_2round.sol#29)
	- round += 1 (shared/denial_of_service/list_dos/list_dos_2round.sol#33)
